org.spongepowered.api.event.action

Interface InteractEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cancellable, Event
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BreedEntityEvent, BreedEntityEvent.Breed, BreedEntityEvent.FindMate, BreedEntityEvent.ReadyToMate, HandInteractEvent, InteractBlockEvent, InteractBlockEvent.Primary, InteractBlockEvent.Primary.MainHand, InteractBlockEvent.Primary.OffHand, InteractBlockEvent.Secondary, InteractBlockEvent.Secondary.MainHand, InteractBlockEvent.Secondary.OffHand, InteractEntityEvent, InteractEntityEvent.Primary, InteractEntityEvent.Primary.MainHand, InteractEntityEvent.Primary.OffHand, InteractEntityEvent.Secondary, InteractEntityEvent.Secondary.MainHand, InteractEntityEvent.Secondary.OffHand, InteractItemEvent, InteractItemEvent.Primary, InteractItemEvent.Primary.MainHand, InteractItemEvent.Primary.OffHand, InteractItemEvent.Secondary, InteractItemEvent.Secondary.MainHand, InteractItemEvent.Secondary.OffHand

    public interface InteractEvent
extends Event, Cancellable
    Base event for all interactions.
